ProductConfigurationRule.name: ProductConfigurationRule
ProductConfigurationRule.description: Represents the validation, inclusion, and exclusion rules for products in the context of the selling process. The selling process can be quoting, configuration, or ordering.

ConfigurationRuleDefinition.description: The configuration rule criteria and actions.

Description.description: The description of the configuration rule.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date and time from which the configuration rules comes into effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date and time to which the configuration rules ceases to be in effect.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date the configuration rule record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date the configuration rule record was last viewed.

Name.description: The name of the configuration rule.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the configuraion rule owner.

ProcessScope.description: The scope of the configuration rule.

RuleSubType.description: The segregation of products into subsets such that the configuration rules only apply to the products that fall under the ambit of the selected rule subtype.

RuleType.description: Indicates the industry vertical or the feature of the industry vertical thatâ€™s using the configuration rule.

Sequence.description: Indicates the order for executing the configuration rule. Rules with lower numbers run first when multiple rules are triggered at once.

Status.description: The lifecycle status of the configuration rule.
